# jamfpro_department (Resource)

This resource (`jamfpro_department`) manages Departments in Jamf Pro

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Department

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) ID of the Department
